content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI remembered browsing a website for travel recommendations, but it didn\'t provide a specific answer. I then used the command "google" to search for the best places to travel in 2023. My computer returned a list of 8 websites with recommendations for the best places to travel in 2023.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.travelandleisure.com/best-places-to-go-2023-6827750", "question": "What are the best places to travel in 2023 according to this website?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides multiple lists of the best places to travel in 2023 according to different sources, including Travel + Leisure magazine and various websites. The destinations mentioned include Alexandria, Virginia; Cairo and the Nile; Basin and Range National Monument, Nevada; Havana, Cuba; Tangier, Morocco; Lakes Region, Turkey; the United Kingdom; Venice, Italy; San Francisco, Seoul, West Africa, coastal Ecuador, the Mediterranean, Greenland, Hvar in Croatia, Andorra, Asheville in North Carolina, and Ays√©n in Chile; the Hudson Valley, New York; Lower Zambezi National Park, Zambia; Prince Edward Island, Canada; Tanzania; Uttar Pradesh, India; Bermuda; Cayman Islands; Coastal Uruguay; Guadeloupe; the Jersey Shore, New Jersey; and Maui, Hawaii, among others. The text provides information on new and noteworthy attractions, accommodations, and experiences in each of these destinations. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.travelandleisure.com/best-places-to-go-2023-6827750#main)', '\\n\\nTravel + Leisure\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://www.travelandleisure.com/)', ' Trip Ideas\\n (https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas)', ' Weekend Getaways\\n (https://www.travelandleisure.com/weekend-getaways)', ' Romantic Trips\\n (https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/romantic-getaways)']"}]
"""
